post.title: canon e1 plastic?
post.content: is the canon e1 made of plastic? i really want it (13 year old) in blue.. there is no other camera i want but its a tad expensive but im willing to pay it iv looked everywhere and there is no other camera i want!! just worried is it plastic because that will make it look more childish than it already is!!....yes im a mature 13 year old!!
